title: About me
text1: Hi, I'm Sergey â€” a web developer. I specialize in creating responsive and high-performance applications. For the past 1.5 years, I've created solutions that are not only technically advanced but also user- and business-focused. My goal is simple: to write clean, efficient, and scalable code.
text2: My primary specialization is React. My core stack is TypeScript, JavaScript, React, Next, Redux, the Redux toolkit, and RTK Query. I'm constantly improving my skills in these technologies and actively learning new things to expand my capabilities and achieve a higher level of professionalism.
text3: I'm also developing my interpersonal skills to better communicate with clients and my team. This quality helps me better understand people's needs and create products that genuinely solve problems rather than create new ones.
text4: Let's get in touch. I'm open to any type of collaboration.
